title: The equidistant dimension of some graphs of convex polytopes
authors:
Aleksandar Savi\'c, Zoran Maksimovi\'c, Milena Bogdanovi\'c, Jozef
  Kratica
abstract:
This paper is devoted to some rotationally symmetric classes of graphs
denoted in literature as convex polytope graphs. Exact value of equidistant
dimension is found for $T_n$. Next, for even $n$ exact values are found for
$R''_n$ and $S''_n$, while for odd $n$ exact value is found for $S_n$. Finally,
for odd $n$, lower bound are found for $R''_n$ and $S''_n$.
